[[Yamato]] performs the necessary [[hand seals]], then wood emerges and covers his entire body with a puff of smoke or [[chakra]], covering up the transformation. Once the technique is done, the transformation is complete. It acts more like a costume than a transformation, as he is able to leave it behind if necessary. He also demonstrates the ability to adjust his voice while using this technique.

[[fr:Mokuton - Transformation]]
[[pl:Mokuton: Henge]]
